tool.name: Advanced restitution: summary
tool.description: from Animal Detection on Acoustic Recordings
tool.command:
Rscript '$__tool_directory__/BilanEnrichiPF.R' '$idc2' '$__tool_directory__/refPF.csv' '$__tool_directory__/SpeciesList.csv'
&& tail -n +2 output-summary.html > tmp && mv tmp output-summary.html && tail -n +2 output-nightly.html > tmp && mv tmp output-nightly.html && tail -n +2 output-hourly.html > tmp && mv tmp output-hourly.html

param.name: idc2
param.label: Corrected and validated observation file
param.help: Use output file from 'Tadarida identifications integration' : a sampling session file corrected and validated.

param.name: output_choice
param.label: Select a summary display
param.help: Chose whether your want a nigthly, hourly or global summary

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
========================== Advanced restitution ==========================
**What it does**
The tool treats observations made with the "Point fixe" protocol: https://www.vigienature-ecole.fr/node/954&gt
**Arguments**
- Input is an observation/participation file corrected by the tools IdCorrect_2ndLayer and IdValid. - Outputs are Summary/Nightly/Hourly raw tabulars, and html visualisations.
